title: Telephone factor
brief_description: The telephone has long since become the foremost means of communication throughout the world. The film shows a wide range of modern telephone techniques. In an attractive presentation which takes the audience on a trip around the world, it shows the numerous possibilities of the telephone applied to all walks of life, from the private household to international enterprises.
